H0.text: Which three colours appear on the flag of the Republic of Ireland. Red, White, Blue

H1.text: Which three colours appear on the flag of the Republic of Ireland. Yellow, Black, Red

H2.text: Which three colours appear on the flag of the Republic of Ireland. Purple, Gold, Silver

H3.text: Which three colours appear on the flag of the Republic of Ireland. Green, White, Orange

A4.text: The tricolour of green, white and orange.
